properties.displayName: _CSGP: ExchangeOnline - Multiple users email forwarded to same destination
properties.description:
Enabled 06/10 by kc - tweaked the rule a bit and put it back into dev with auto assign.

DISABLE NOTE:  Disabled by LT on 3/17. The analytic behind this rule is well intentioned, but it is not capturing the intended information. It needs to be re-evaluated / rewritten. 

Identifies when multiple (more than one) users mailboxes are configured to forward to the same destination. 
This could be an attacker-controlled destination mailbox configured to collect mail from multiple compromised user accounts.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat:
Identifies when multiple (more than one) users mailboxes are configured to forward to the same destination. 
This could be an attacker-controlled destination mailbox configured to collect mail from multiple compromised user accounts.

Handling guidance: 
Review the forwarding destination identified in this alert - is this activity suspect? 
Who created the forwarding rules? 
You may need to determine why the mail forwarding rules were created. 
Consult with the Exchange team if necessary.
